project.name: J-C774B-LUCE-02-ST03-DT01-DF06-CF20-01
project.description: This test takes in integer n. The program attempts to open n files. If n is large enough the number of file handles will be exhausted, these files handlers are never closed, and stored in a global arraylist, causing the entire program to fail to open any files from that point on.

iopair.name: J-C774B-LUCE-02-ST03-DT01-DF06-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: index a single file Environment variable defining number of files to create.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="5" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND GOOD-02 AND GOOD-03 AND GOOD-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

output_checks.simple_check: if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfe ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfs ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

iopair.name: J-C774B-LUCE-02-ST03-DT01-DF06-CF20-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Environment variable defining number of files to create.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="20000" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
if (( $(pcregrep -Mc "Failed to create new file, moving on\.\n\d+" "logfile.txt") > 0 )); then echo "FAILED"; else echo "OK"; fi;
printf "Cleanup pattern repeated $(pcregrep -Mc """Failed to create new file, moving on\.\n\d+""" "logfile.txt") times\n"

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && pcregrep -Mv "Failed to create new file, moving on\.\n\d+" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_ej2pb0Gbhnz0lMldKGxD AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (failed_to_create_file_cYhIth3kwo) AND NOT timeout_CXqp9WeHdv) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((failed_to_create_file_cYhIth3kwo) OR timeout_CXqp9WeHdv OR controlled_exit_CXfK9p0rH4)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (failed_to_create_file_cYhIth3kwo) AND NOT timeout_CXqp9WeHdv) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((failed_to_create_file_cYhIth3kwo) OR timeout_CXqp9WeHdv OR controlled_exit_CXfK9p0rH4))

if (( $(pcregrep -Mc "Failed to create new file, moving on\.\n\d+" "logfile.txt") > 0 )); then echo "FAILED"; else echo "OK"; fi;
printf "Cleanup pattern repeated $(pcregrep -Mc """Failed to create new file, moving on\.\n\d+""" "logfile.txt") times\n"

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && pcregrep -Mv "Failed to create new file, moving on\.\n\d+" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_PqDo5V9iNqhYRq1uyRjQ AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (failed_to_create_file_oCGnQqLVzt) AND NOT timeout_8FCbgY2Hlu) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((failed_to_create_file_oCGnQqLVzt) OR timeout_8FCbgY2Hlu OR controlled_exit_WPomGtOhqw)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (failed_to_create_file_oCGnQqLVzt) AND NOT timeout_8FCbgY2Hlu) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((failed_to_create_file_oCGnQqLVzt) OR timeout_8FCbgY2Hlu OR controlled_exit_WPomGtOhqw))
